text: @realDonaldTrump @FoxNews Mr. President, this day is supposed to be all about the Cadets, however, as you always do, you've made this day about you, turned it into yet another photo op AND unnecessarily exposed the entire class of 2020 to COVID-19 risks. #TrumpIsANationalDisgrace
